verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pierce my ear, O Lord, my God. Lead me to Your door this day. I will serve no other gods, Lord, I’m here to stay.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For You have paid the price for me With Your blood You ransomed me I will serve You eternally A free man I’ll never be.{/lang-eng}
